TopicTitle: Kopernicus: templated a body using Kerbin, and want to remove the ground stations.

Articles.Content:
I previously templated one of my mod planets on Laythe. I changed it to Kerbin, and I was able to remove the KSC and such, but I still get active comnet station lines showing up to my craft that should not have a com link.

How can I remove them?

Current start of my config:

Quote

Kopernicus:AFTER[Kopernicus]
{
    useOnDemand = false   
    Body
    {
        name = Rald
        flightGlobalsIndex = 199
        Template
            {
                name = Kerbin // was Laythe
            removeOcean = False // was true
                removePQSMods = PQSMod_City, PQSMod_City2, PQSMod_MapDecal, PQSMod_MapDecalTangent, PQSMod_FlattenArea, PQSMod_LandControl, PQSMod_VertexColorMap, PQSMod_AltitudeAlpha, PQSMod_VertexHeightNoise, PQSMod_VertexSimplexHeightMap, PQSMod_VertexHeightMap
            }

On 5/17/2021 at 2:12 AM, KerikBalm said:

I previously templated one of my mod planets on Laythe. I changed it to Kerbin, and I was able to remove the KSC and such, but I still get active comnet station lines showing up to my craft that should not have a com link.

How can I remove them?

Current start of my config:

Comment : Incomplete config
Reality : You cannot replace KSC 
Reason : It must be on "kerbin" (the planet that has kerbin template)
Tip: Never take kerbin as a template
